content: "How did you like that, dear friend," said Tom with a smile, "this checkmate that I gave you with my queen?" - Mary was shocked at first. Would she have missed something? But she soon smiled too and replied, "Well, what would you think if I captured your queen with my knight?" And having moved the knight, she removed the queen from the board.
translations: ita:Come ti è piaciuto, cara amica, disse Tom con un sorriso, questo scacco matto che ti ho dato con la mia donna﹖ - All'ini
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
